column1: Smoque BBQ////About the place in general
column3: it's packed (thanks Guy Fieri!) but it's BYOB so bring something to drink while you're in line. Both times I've gone
column5: I waited no more than 20 minutes for a table. They've got a very efficient system going
column7: then shortly after that you get your food. Â It's cheap (to me at least) and a good amount of food for what you pay.
